name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prayer Times - Islamic New Tab with Weather and Moon Phases

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prayer times, weather updates, moon phases, and inspiring wallpapers. Start each tab mindfully with Basmalah and a stylish clock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

Precise Prayer Times: Never miss a prayer again. Get accurate, location-based prayer times right on your new tab page, keeping you connected to your faith throughout the day.

Real-Time Weather Reports: Stay prepared with up-to-date weather information. Plan your day effectively with current conditions and forecasts at a glance.

Moon Phase Tracker: Easily follow the lunar cycle for important Islamic dates and events. Know the current moon phase without leaving your browser.

Basmalah: Begin every browsing session with a spiritual reminder. The Basmalah invocation greets you on each new tab, setting a mindful tone for your online activities.

Clear Clock and Date Display: Keep track of time effortlessly. A prominently displayed clock and date help you stay punctual and organized.

Serene Wallpapers: Enjoy a visual feast with our collection of calming and inspiring backgrounds. Each new tab opens to a beautiful, carefully curated wallpaper that soothes your mind.

Experience a harmonious blend of faith and functionality with Islamic New Tab. It's more than just a new tab page â€“ it's your personal spiritual dashboard.
